description: five horizontal bands (top to bottom) two figures and boat with birds at left, two figures with tree at right; locusts, butterflies and horses; two figures, chickens, quail and locusts; rabbits, oxen and sheep; dogs, fish, two figures, locusts and ants; red ground; crinkled paper; framed
